attributes.action: Lift the ban on the Red Arrows performing at the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Red Arrows display team have been banned from performing at the 2012 Olympic Games by the Department of Culture, Media and Sport.  The Red Arrows are a great Brittish institution and should be something to be proud of.  They should be allowed to perform at the 2012 games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
